memories.content: Successfully analyzed solomon_codes codebase and created comprehensive CLAUDE.md file. Key findings: TypeScript monorepo with Better-T-Stack, Next.js 15 web app, Astro Starlight docs, Bun package manager, Biome/Ultracite for code quality, PWA support, strict accessibility rules via Ultracite configuration.
memories.context: Codebase analysis for /init command - created CLAUDE.md with project structure, commands, architecture details

memories.content: New Feature Request: Add Playwright and Stagehand to the Next.js app following https://docs.stagehand.dev/examples/nextjs integration patterns. User wants browser automation capabilities integrated into the solomon_codes web application.
memories.context: Feature implementation for /new-feature command - adding Playwright + Stagehand integration

memories.content: Starting research on Stagehand Next.js integration patterns - need to find setup, API patterns, env config, security, and examples
memories.context: User requested research on Stagehand docs at https://docs.stagehand.dev/examples/nextjs

memories.content: Completed comprehensive research on Stagehand Next.js integration patterns - found official docs, quickstart repo, dependencies, config patterns, security considerations, and API route structures
memories.context: Research included: dependencies (@browserbasehq/stagehand, @browserbasehq/sdk, playwright, zod), environment config (BROWSERBASE_API_KEY, BROWSERBASE_PROJECT_ID, OPENAI_API_KEY), server actions pattern, security through env vars, iframe embedding with Browserbase sessions

memories.content: User approved Playwright + Stagehand integration solution. Implementation approach: Server Actions + API Routes pattern, Browserbase cloud integration, similar UI structure to existing pages, environment variables for API keys. User referenced .env.local file location.
memories.context: Solution validation approved - proceeding with implementation

memories.content: User requested to commit and push Stagehand integration work to a new remote repository. Current progress: Dependencies installed, server actions created, API routes implemented, UI components built, navigation added. Some TypeScript API issues to resolve but core integration structure complete.
memories.context: Git commit and push request for Stagehand integration

memories.content: Starting serena MCP tool setup - removing serena branch, checking out main, then setting up git worktrees for parallel development
memories.context: User wants to start fresh with serena MCP tool and setup git worktrees

memories.content: Successfully cleaned up serena branches and returned to main. Now setting up git worktree system for parallel development.
memories.context: Preparing to create proper worktree setup

memories.content: Successfully completed git worktree setup with serena MCP tool integration. Created serena-dev worktree, comprehensive navigation helpers, shell aliases, and validated full functionality. All core commands working: create, list, switch, remove, cleanup. Documentation complete with workflow guides and troubleshooting.
memories.context: Git worktree system fully operational for parallel development
